nodes.text: Ruhe was a planet that was allied with the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. Dooku maintained a citadel on Ruhe, situated on the edge of a massive volcanic or meteoric crater. Half a month after the Battle of Boz Pity, a strike team including Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Jenks was shot down on Ruhe while trying to capture Dooku; it was later revealed that it was a trap set by Dooku in the hopes of capturing Skywalker and Kenobi.
